pre_transfer_justdo_to_org_notice_html:
You are about to transfer this JustDo to __dest_org_name__.
All members in this JustDo will become members of __dest_org_name__.
org_expiring_soon_notice_title: Your organization license is expiring soon!
org_expiring_soon_notice_html:
The license for your organization __org_name__ will expire on __org_expiration_date__.
We hope that JustDo have made your work life easier!
org_locked_notice_html:
The license for your organization __org_name__ has expired on __org_expiration_date__.
We hope that JustDo have made your work life easier, and we would love to continue to do so!
org_access_restricted_html:
Access to your organization __org_name__ is currently restricted. Please contact your organization administrators for more details regarding this matter.
We appreciate your patience and understanding.
renew_org_license_instruction_html:
You can renew the license by clicking on the "Renew License" button below.
Our support team is always happy to assist you.

Thank you for being part of the JustDo community. We are actively developing new features for the next release to enhance your workflow!
org_pre_expire_renewal_contact_page_mess: My organization __org_name__ __optional_domain_msg__ is about to expire and I'd like to renew the license.
org_post_expire_renewal_contact_page_mes: My organization __org_name__ __optional_domain_msg__ has expired and I'd like to renew the license.
